title: Binding a single-variant nullary tag does not work
body:
```
tag chan {
    chan_t;
}

fn wrapper3(i: chan) {
    log_err i;
}

fn main() {
    let wrapped = bind wrapper3(chan_t);                                                                                                                       
    wrapped();
}
```
